meta.title: An Overview of the Drigung Kagyü Tradition

nodes.body: The Drigung Kagyü ('bri gung bka' brgyud) order was named after Drigung ('bri gung) monastery founded by Jikten Gönpo ('jig rten mgon po, 1143-1217), aka Jikten Sumgön ('jig rten gsum mgon).
nodes.title: An Overview of the Drigung Kagyü Tradition
